title: RHOSLC: Zion Lyin'
description:
The madness continues on The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City as Jen and Meredith continue to quarrel at their house in Zion. But nothing prepares us for Meredith's early morning explosion at breakfast.

For those of you who can't make the 2022 Golden Crappies Awards in-person this year, experience it live digitally from the comfort of your own home at momenthouse.com/wwc

Also, this episode is a Crappens on Demand episode, which means you can watch us here: https://www.patreon.com/posts/61600270
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (benron)
